name: Doors 2D [Achievement]
description:
Instructions:

Up Down Arrow Keys or W S Keys to move.

E to interact with Closets, Drawers and Keys.

Move to Exit Closets.

Notes:

This is a remake of Doors but made in 2D.

The game is still in Early Access. Be patient for the full release.

Credits:

LSplash and Redibles for Doors.

Youtube for Sounds.

Roblox for Sounds.

Doors Wiki for Information, Images and Sounds.

Scratchers from Scratch Credits:

QuaticQ for Hide's Get Out Screen and Thumbnail's Text.

mocca200 for You Died Screen.

BIGCHUNGASFATTY for Testing.

1x2x3x4x5x4x3x2x1 for Testing.

pro123omg123 for others.

Current Version: v0.3
